item.title: 地表-地下过程耦合的数值水文模型综述
item.description:
数值水文模型综述。

How to cite. 舒乐乐, 陈昊, 孟宪红, 常燕, 胡立堂, 王文科, 束龙仓, 俞烜, Duffy C, 姚莹莹, 郑东海. 2024. 地表-地下过程耦合的数值水文模型综述. 中国科 学: 地球科学, 54(5): 1484–1505, doi: 10.1360/SSTe-2022-0420

item.title: rSHUD v2.0: advancing the Simulator for Hydrologic Unstructured Domains and unstructured hydrological modeling in the R environment
item.description: How to cite. Shu, L., Ullrich, P., Meng, X., Duffy, C., Chen, H., and Li, Z.: rSHUD v2.0: advancing the Simulator for Hydrologic Unstructured Domains and unstructured hydrological modeling in the R environment, Geosci. Model Dev., 17, 497–527, https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-17-497-2024, 2024.
